1.name: wordpress/travel-gmap3
1.description:
travel-gmap3 is an open source a solution built for Wordpress to display your Google Maps with the JQuery plugin Gmap3 on your Wordpress as a Widget or in a post. (You have to draw your map on Google Maps (like a road trip) and copy the link on the plugin administration) Format : http://maps.google.co.nz/maps/ms?msid=...fbd972e&msa=0&output=kml How? http://maps.google.co.nz > My places > Create new map > (draw lines of your trip) > Copy the link here (icon link on top right)

Major features include:

  • Manage a list of map (add, edit, delete a Google map in Wordpress)
  • Add a map on a widget (and create several widget map) on selecting a map and configure width and height
  • Add a map on a post with this syntax [travelGmap3 id="2" width="250" height="350"]
<
